trigger: Thermostat outdoor temperature is greater than
trigger_description: This trigger fires every time your ecobee thermostat senses that the outdoor temperature is greater than a specific value you supply.

trigger: Thermostat indoor temperature is less than
trigger_description: This trigger fires every time your ecobee thermostat senses that the indoor temperature is less than a specific value you supply.

trigger: Thermostat indoor humidity is greater than
trigger_description: This trigger fires every time your ecobee thermostat senses that the indoor humidity is greater than a specific value you supply.

trigger: Thermostat indoor humidity is less than
trigger_description: This trigger fires every time your ecobee thermostat senses that the indoor humidity is less than a specific value you supply.
This trigger fires every time your ecobee thermostat and Room Sensors change to Smart Home or Smart Away comfort profiles.

trigger: Thermostat outdoor humidity is greater than
trigger_description: This trigger fires every time your ecobee thermostat senses that the outdoor humidity is greater than a specific value you supply.

trigger: Thermostat outdoor temperature is less than
trigger_description: This trigger fires every time your ecobee thermostat senses that the outdoor temperature is less than a specific value you supply.

trigger: Thermostat outdoor humidity is less than
trigger_description: This trigger fires every time your ecobee thermostat senses that the outdoor humidity is less than a specific value you supply.
This trigger fires every time your ecobee schedule is overridden with a Hold event (including vacations), a Utility Demand Response event, or a Smart Home/Away event.
This trigger fires every time your ecobee light switch is turned off.
This trigger fires every time your ecobee light switch is turned on.

trigger: Thermostat indoor temperature is greater than
trigger_description: This trigger fires every time your ecobee thermostat senses that the indoor temperature is greater than a specific value you supply.
